title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Profiles and Updates on Recent Casualties in Southern Gaza Conflict”

content.rendered:
Attached is the IDF spokesman’s message regarding the names of four IDF casualties, which has been conveyed to their families:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1005202472498075298

Attached is a link to the IDF’s site where the profile and photos of the deceased are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In the incident in which the soldiers fell, a combat officer and a soldier from Battalion 931, Nahal Brigade were seriously injured.

Furthermore, two soldiers from Battalion 9, Brigade 401, were seriously injured in combat in southern Gaza Strip.

The injured soldiers were taken for medical treatment to the hospital, their families have been updated.
